nodes.text: Soleks was an Imperial engineer on the planet Hoth during the Cold War. In 3642 BBY, Soleks was tasked with placing navigational beacons around a volcanic sinkhole located in the Northern Snowdrift Hills in the Clabburn Tundra. Upon arrival, however, Soleks realized the area surrounding the sinkhole was a Wampa breeding ground. He then asked an Imperial hero to place the beacons around it to alert any Imperial troops to stay away.
